meanings.definition: Relating to the movement or effects of light.
meanings.sent1: The photokinetic artwork changed colors when exposed to sunlight.
meanings.sent2: The photokinetic plants opened their petals as the sun rose.
meanings.sent3: The photokinetic nightlight turned off automatically when it sensed daylight.
meanings.sent4: Her photokinetic smile brightened up the room like a ray of sunshine.
meanings.sent5: The photokinetic crystals shimmered and danced in the sunlight, creating a magical display.

meanings.definition: Capable of producing motion or energy in response to light.
meanings.sent1: The photokinetic toy car moved forward when light shone on its solar panel.
meanings.sent2: The photokinetic device powered itself using solar energy.
meanings.sent3: The photokinetic robot happily danced under the sun's rays.
meanings.sent4: The photokinetic windmill spun gracefully in the sunlight, generating electricity.
meanings.sent5: The photokinetic watch charged itself simply by being exposed to light during the day.
